description: Displays detailed information about a specified application.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The ID of the application that will be described.

nested_items.name: application
nested_items.description: The output displays information about the specified application.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The ID of the application.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the application.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the application.

nested_items.name: releaseLabel
nested_items.description: The Amazon EMR release associated with the application.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of application, such as Spark or Hive.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The state of the application.

nested_items.name: stateDetails
nested_items.description: The state details of the application.

nested_items.name: initialCapacity
nested_items.description: The initial capacity of the application.

nested_items.name: workerCount
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: workerCount
nested_items.description: The number of workers in the initial capacity configuration.

nested_items.name: workerConfiguration
nested_items.description: The resource configuration of the initial capacity configuration.

nested_items.name: cpu
nested_items.description: The CPU requirements for every worker instance of the worker type.

nested_items.name: memory
nested_items.description: The memory requirements for every worker instance of the worker type.

nested_items.name: disk
nested_items.description: The disk requirements for every worker instance of the worker type.

nested_items.name: diskType
nested_items.description: The disk type for every worker instance of the work type. Shuffle optimized disks have higher performance characteristics and are better for shuffle heavy workloads. Default is STANDARD.

nested_items.name: maximumCapacity
nested_items.description: The maximum capacity of the application. This is cumulative across all workers at any given point in time during the lifespan of the application is created. No new resources will be created once any one of the defined limits is hit.

nested_items.name: cpu
nested_items.description: The maximum allowed CPU for an application.

nested_items.name: memory
nested_items.description: The maximum allowed resources for an application.

nested_items.name: disk
nested_items.description: The maximum allowed disk for an application.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the application run was created.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time when the application run was last updated.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: autoStartConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for an application to automatically start on job submission.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Enables the application to automatically start on job submission. Defaults to true.

nested_items.name: autoStopConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for an application to automatically stop after a certain amount of time being idle.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Enables the application to automatically stop after a certain amount of time being idle. Defaults to true.

nested_items.name: idleTimeoutMinutes
nested_items.description: The amount of idle time in minutes after which your application will automatically stop. Defaults to 15 minutes.

nested_items.name: networkConfiguration
nested_items.description: The network configuration for customer VPC connectivity for the application.

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: The array of subnet Ids for customer VPC connectivity.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: securityGroupIds
nested_items.description: The array of security group Ids for customer VPC connectivity.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: architecture
nested_items.description: The CPU architecture of an application.

nested_items.name: imageConfiguration
nested_items.description: The image configuration applied to all worker types.

nested_items.name: imageUri
nested_items.description: The image URI.

nested_items.name: resolvedImageDigest
nested_items.description: The SHA256 digest of the image URI. This indicates which specific image the application is configured for. The image digest doesn't exist until an application has started.

nested_items.name: workerTypeSpecifications
nested_items.description: The specification applied to each worker type.

nested_items.name: imageConfiguration
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: imageConfiguration
nested_items.description: The image configuration for a worker type.

nested_items.name: imageUri
nested_items.description: The image URI.

nested_items.name: resolvedImageDigest
nested_items.description: The SHA256 digest of the image URI. This indicates which specific image the application is configured for. The image digest doesn't exist until an application has started.

nested_items.name: runtimeConfiguration
nested_items.description: The Configuration specifications of an application. Each configuration consists of a classification and properties. You use this parameter when creating or updating an application. To see the runtimeConfiguration object of an application, run the GetApplication API operation.

nested_items.name: classification
nested_items.description: The classification within a configuration.

nested_items.name: properties
nested_items.description: A set of properties specified within a configuration classification.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: configurations
nested_items.description: A list of additional configurations to apply within a configuration object.

nested_items.name: monitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration setting for monitoring.

nested_items.name: s3MonitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 configuration for monitoring log publishing.

nested_items.name: logUri
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 destination URI for log publishing.

nested_items.name: encryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The KMS key ARN to encrypt the logs published to the given Amazon S3 destination.

nested_items.name: managedPersistenceMonitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: The managed log persistence configuration for a job run.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Enables managed logging and defaults to true. If set to false, managed logging will be turned off.

nested_items.name: encryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The KMS key ARN to encrypt the logs stored in managed log persistence.

nested_items.name: cloudWatchLoggingConfiguration
nested_items.description: The Amazon CloudWatch configuration for monitoring logs. You can configure your jobs to send log information to CloudWatch.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Enables CloudWatch logging.

nested_items.name: logGroupName
nested_items.description: The name of the log group in Amazon CloudWatch Logs where you want to publish your logs.

nested_items.name: logStreamNamePrefix
nested_items.description: Prefix for the CloudWatch log stream name.

nested_items.name: encryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The Key Management Service (KMS) key ARN to encrypt the logs that you store in CloudWatch Logs.

nested_items.name: prometheusMonitoringConfiguration
nested_items.description: The monitoring configuration object you can configure to send metrics to Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus for a job run.

nested_items.name: remoteWriteUrl
nested_items.description: The remote write URL in the Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus workspace to send metrics to.

nested_items.name: interactiveConfiguration
nested_items.description: The interactive configuration object that enables the interactive use cases for an application.

nested_items.name: studioEnabled
nested_items.description: Enables you to connect an application to Amazon EMR Studio to run interactive workloads in a notebook.

nested_items.name: livyEndpointEnabled
nested_items.description: Enables an Apache Livy endpoint that you can connect to and run interactive jobs.

nested_items.name: schedulerConfiguration
nested_items.description: The scheduler configuration for batch and streaming jobs running on this application. Supported with release labels emr-7.0.0 and above.

nested_items.name: queueTimeoutMinutes
nested_items.description: The maximum duration in minutes for the job in QUEUED state. If scheduler configuration is enabled on your application, the default value is 360 minutes (6 hours). The valid range is from 15 to 720.

nested_items.name: maxConcurrentRuns
nested_items.description: The maximum concurrent job runs on this application. If scheduler configuration is enabled on your application, the default value is 15. The valid range is 1 to 1000.
